# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [0.1.0] - 2024-10-10

### Added
- Initial release of Extract Monster Python SDK
- Support for file extraction via `extract_file()`
- Support for text extraction via `extract_text()`
- Pydantic model support for type-safe schemas
- JSON Schema dictionary support
- Comprehensive error handling with custom exceptions
- Context manager support for automatic cleanup
- Response model with dict-like access
- Extensive documentation and examples
- Unit tests with pytest
- PyPI packaging configuration

### Features
- Extract from PDFs, images, videos, audio, and text documents
- Type-safe schema definitions using Pydantic
- Automatic schema conversion
- Bearer token authentication
- Custom base URL and timeout configuration
- Detailed error messages and status codes

[0.1.0]: https://github.com/extract-monster/extract-monster-python/releases/tag/v0.1.0
